title: Good Friends
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Kukuku…. Rejoice, Nico. For I, Yohane, will make you my honorary little demon. You may bow down and worship me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You may rejoice too, Yoshiko. As Nico, the number one idol in the universe, will take you as a disciple<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>….To defy a fallen angel, you surely have some nerve. You have the potential as a little demon…. But it’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane, okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Heaven and hell are merely a figment of the human mind, right? If you look at them from the perspective of the universe they’re just dots, dots you know. That’s why fallen angels are also just another part of the universe. This Nico is offering that fallen angel an opportunity to become Nico’s disciple, you should be grateful<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not just a figment! Yohane isn’t like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>See! That! You can’t be like that, you’re soft, too soft!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eeeh….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Stick to your character. You can’t call yourself a fallen angel if you can’t at least talk Nico down no matter what Nico says!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Like I said! Yohane isn’t a character or anything like that!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>No excuses! Nico told you to stick to it, okay---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
